title: Implement Email/Password Authentication
user_story: As a user, I want to log in with my email address and password, so that I can securely access my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password on login page
System validates email format and password is not empty
Passwords are hashed with bcrypt before storage
Successful login creates JWT session token
Failed login shows generic 'Invalid credentials' error
Rate limiting applied: max 5 attempts per IP per 15 minutes
Account locked after 5 consecutive failed attempts
Email sent to user when account is locked
technical_notes: Use FastAPI for API endpoints, bcrypt for hashing, PostgreSQL for user storage (per ADR-002)

title: Implement OAuth 2.0 Social Login (Google and GitHub)
user_story: As a user, I want to log in with my Google or GitHub account, so that I can access the platform without creating a new password.
acceptance_criteria: User can select Google or GitHub login option
OAuth 2.0 flow implemented for both providers
First-time social login creates new user account
Existing users can link social accounts to their profile
User can unlink social accounts from profile page
Error handling for OAuth failures (denied permission, network issues)
User redirected to original page after successful login
Social login respects rate limiting rules
technical_notes: Implement OAuth callbacks, store provider tokens securely, handle token refresh

title: Implement Two-Factor Authentication (TOTP)
user_story: As a security-conscious user, I want to enable two-factor authentication on my account, so that my account is protected even if my password is compromised.
acceptance_criteria: User can enable 2FA from profile security settings
QR code generated for TOTP setup
User scans QR code with authenticator app
User enters 6-digit verification code to confirm setup
Backup recovery codes generated and displayed (10 codes)
User must save backup codes before completing setup
2FA required on subsequent logins after enabled
User can disable 2FA from profile settings
Admin can disable 2FA for locked-out users
technical_notes: Use TOTP standard (RFC 6238), generate QR codes with secret key, store backup codes securely

title: Create 2FA Setup Wizard
user_story: As a new 2FA user, I want a step-by-step wizard to set up two-factor authentication, so that I can easily enable this security feature without confusion.
acceptance_criteria: Step 1: Explain what 2FA is and why it's beneficial
Step 2: Show instructions to download authenticator app
Step 3: Display QR code with option to copy secret manually
Step 4: User enters verification code to confirm setup
Step 5: Display backup codes with option to download/print
User can navigate back/forward through steps
Wizard has clear progress indicator
Each step has illustrations or icons for clarity
Wizard is mobile-responsive
technical_notes: Use modal dialog, implement step navigation, integrate with 2FA backend API

title: Build User Profile Management Page
user_story: As a user, I want a centralized profile page where I can manage my security settings and connected accounts, so that I have full control over my authentication preferences.
acceptance_criteria: Profile page has multiple sections: Security, Connected Accounts, Login History, Account Recovery
Security section shows 2FA status with enable/disable toggle
Security section has 'Change Password' button
Connected Accounts section lists linked social logins
User can disconnect social accounts
Login History section shows last 10 logins
Each login shows: timestamp, IP, device, location, auth method
Account Recovery section shows active backup codes (if 2FA enabled)
All sections are mobile-responsive
technical_notes: Extend existing design system, fetch data from multiple API endpoints

title: Implement Login History Tracking
user_story: As a user, I want to see my recent login history with detailed information, so that I can detect any unauthorized access to my account.
acceptance_criteria: System logs each login attempt (successful and failed)
Login record includes: timestamp, IP address, device info, location, auth method
User can view last 10 logins on profile page
Option to view more login history (pagination)
Current session clearly indicated
Failed login attempts shown with red indicator
User can report suspicious activity with 'This wasn't me' button
Login history stored for 90 days
User can export login history as CSV
technical_notes: Create login_history table, log from authentication service, implement CSV export

title: Implement Password Reset Flow
user_story: As a user who forgot my password, I want to reset it securely via email, so that I can regain access to my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can click 'Forgot Password' link on login page
User enters email address to receive reset link
System sends email with unique reset token
Reset token expires after 1 hour
Reset token is single-use only
Password reset page shows password strength indicator
Password requirements checklist shown in real-time
User must enter password twice for confirmation
Successful reset invalidates all existing sessions
User receives email confirmation after password change
technical_notes: Generate secure tokens, implement token expiration, send templated emails

title: Implement User Registration with Email Verification
user_story: As a new user, I want to create an account with my email and password, so that I can start using the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can access registration page from login page
Registration form collects: email, password, password confirmation
Email format validated
Password strength validated (8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, special char)
User must accept Terms of Service checkbox
System checks for disposable email domains
Verification email sent after registration
User cannot log in until email is verified
Verification link expires after 24 hours
User can resend verification email if needed
technical_notes: Implement email validation library, create verification token system, send templated emails

title: Implement 'Remember Me' Extended Sessions
user_story: As a frequent user, I want to stay logged in on my trusted devices for longer periods, so that I don't have to re-enter my credentials every day.
acceptance_criteria: Login page has 'Remember Me' checkbox
Normal session expires after 24 hours
Remember Me session expires after 30 days
Extended sessions stored in Redis
User still required to re-authenticate for sensitive operations (change password, disable 2FA)
User can view active sessions on profile page
User can revoke individual sessions
All sessions revoked on password change
Extended sessions use secure, HttpOnly cookies
technical_notes: Extend JWT expiration based on Remember Me flag, implement session revocation

title: Build Admin Panel for User Account Management
user_story: As a support staff member, I want an admin panel to manage user accounts and resolve authentication issues, so that I can help users who are locked out or experiencing problems.
acceptance_criteria: Admin panel accessible only to users with admin role
Admin can search for users by email or user ID
Admin can view user account status (active, locked, suspended)
Admin can manually unlock locked accounts
Admin can reset user passwords (triggers password reset email)
Admin can disable 2FA for locked-out users
Admin can view user's login history
Admin can suspend/unsuspend user accounts
All admin actions logged in audit trail
Admin panel has proper access controls and permissions
technical_notes: Implement role-based access control, create admin-specific API endpoints, log all admin actions

title: Implement Security Hardening for Authentication APIs
user_story: As a security engineer, I want all authentication endpoints to have comprehensive security measures, so that the system is protected against common attacks.
acceptance_criteria: All authentication endpoints served over HTTPS only
CSRF protection implemented for all state-changing operations
SQL injection prevention via parameterized queries
XSS protection via input sanitization and output encoding
Secure cookie flags set: HttpOnly, Secure, SameSite
Content Security Policy headers configured
Rate limiting applied to all authentication endpoints
Detailed security logging for suspicious activity
Regular expression DoS prevention
Security headers (X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options) configured
technical_notes: Configure FastAPI security middleware, implement security headers, use security scanning tools

title: Ensure Authentication UI Accessibility
user_story: As a user with disabilities, I want the authentication flows to be fully accessible, so that I can use screen readers and keyboard navigation to log in.
acceptance_criteria: All form inputs have proper ARIA labels
Keyboard navigation works throughout authentication flows
Focus management implemented (focus moves logically)
Error messages announced to screen readers
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
Form validation errors clearly associated with inputs
Loading states announced to screen readers
Skip links provided for screen reader users
Tested with NVDA and VoiceOver screen readers
Passes automated accessibility scans (axe, Lighthouse)
technical_notes: Use semantic HTML, implement ARIA attributes, test with assistive technologies
